name: TRANSPORTATION INSTITUTE
description: A non-profit organization dedicated to maritime research education and promotion
sampleDescriptions:
Funding issues in support of P.L. 480, Food for Peace program, Maritime Security Program (MSP) and Cargo Preference. Support and protection of the Jones Act. 
Advance and support efforts for ongoing tug engine replacement project.
